Text:
Ba poozesh: Onvane film be zabane Farsi "Jodayi Nader va Simin sahih ast. 
Sorry: The correct name of movie in Persian language is "The separation of Nader and Simin"

Masoud
where is english sub? not able to watch it without eng sub...
Hi pals. There is not any English sub in the original DVD. It has only Turkish sub. Please inform me if you have any English subtitle for this movie.
Seconded. Please, upload this with English subs, I have been waiting for this movie to come out on DVD for half of year.
